DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness Cook Zenith Endovascular Graft treatment abdominal aortic ( AAA ) , aortoiliac , iliac aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: ZenithÂ® AAA Endovascular Graft Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients aortic aortoiliac aneurysm diameter great equal 4 cm . 2 . Patients iliac aneurysm diameter great equal 3.5 cm . 3 . Patients aortic , aortoiliac , iliac aneurysm history growth great equal 0.5 cm per year . 1 . Patients le 18 year age . 2 . Patient life expectancy le 2 year . 3 . Patients pregnant . 4 . Patients unwilling comply followup schedule . 5 . Patient inability refusal give inform consent .
